title: 13 Migrants Die After Boat Capsizes off Malaysian Coast
content:
Kuala Lumpur, September 03 (QNA) - Thirteen people died after a boat ferrying 70 occupants capsized off Malaysia's west coast, reports said citing local authorities. 
 
 The boast said to be ferrying Indonesian migrants capsized early Thursday near Sabak Bernam town in Selangor state.  A Malaysian official said 13 were killed and local fishermen rescued another 13.   Ships and an aeroplane are deployed to search for survivors. (QNA)
